data.message: Hey Facebook, I haven't installed any of your apps and don't plan on doing so any time. Why do I need the messenger app?

replies.message: Hey Andrew. Messenger is a much faster and better experience. In fact, we've found that people get replies about 20% faster on Messenger than on Facebook. You can learn more about Messenger here: http://bit.ly/2gBbzdI. -Joe
. . . . Speed really doesn't matter though? If i had something important to tell someone I would do it in person or over the phone.
We're sorry to hear you feel that way, Darina. We're confident Messenger is the way to provide a faster and more reliable experience. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2fzpeps. -Jessica

انا اختلف معكم في هذا فأن ماسنجر يجعلك منفردآ بالدردشه والاتصال مع الاشخاص .
يسهل عليك اشياء كثيره .
ماسنجر شئ رائع .
اتمني مزيد من التميز في فيسبوك😘

Hey Andrew, They don't really give a hoot what YOU want, they want to tell you what you SHOULD want and force you into that.  It's how facebook works.  Their user base is so huge they do what they want and don't care what the users want.  I am sure it's another way for them to monitor us and what we do so they can sell the information to the crooks wanting to buy it.  But here's the thing, if you don't use the Facebook app, and you use it in your browser on your phone, like Chrome.... Click the little square in the top right hand corner and look down the list for "Request Desktop View" or something like that.  Then you can click your messages with out the annoying blockage of their "Install Messenger" spam.  Good Luck!
Missy Warren you da real mvp.
If you use FB, you may have noticed we do not pay anything. That is because WE are the product they are selling to advertisers. Does the grocer really care what the potatoes think or want?
Andrew Burns i love msg, esp if i dont want someone else that made a coment to see what i say
i  get mad when the games i play dont get updated and if you contact the game manager they ignore you
